text: The women's 3000 metres event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 22 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Beatrice Chepchumba ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jane Chepkoech ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Etalemahu Kidane ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 22 October {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Women's 3000 metres
